problem_name: Timing Prediction in Semi-Automated Driving Systems
description: Timing prediction in semi-automated driving systems involves estimating the time required for various driving maneuvers to enhance safety and improve user experience. This problem is critical for developing effective driver-assistance systems that can anticipate and react to dynamic driving conditions.
